meta.description: Minimize the cost of a meal plan while meeting daily nutritional requirements for protein, carbohydrates, and calories.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content of each food item in grams.

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrate content of each food item in grams.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Amount of each food item to include in the meal plan.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the meal plan.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 98 grams of protein are included in the meal plan.

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbs[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 113 grams of carbohydrates are included in the meal plan.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1768 calories are included in the meal plan.
